title: Opinion: New York’s aid-in-dying law is missing something: the doctors who can make it work
description: A New York law grants patients the right to request aid in dying. But do the clinicians who guide them through that decision have the training to do so?
content: A New York law grants patients the right to request aid in dying. But do the clinicians who guide them through that decision have the training to do so?
